active_skill.name: Iceblade Dance
active_skill.description:
Executes a series of graceful slashes with an ice blade, dealing Ice DMG and accumulating Ice Anomaly Buildup.

DMG Multiplier: 693%/739.2%/785.4%/831.6%/877%

Daze Multiplier: 378%/405%/432%/459%/486%/513%

Cooldown 20s

additional_ability.name: Dry Ice Field
additional_ability.description: When there are 2 or more Ice Attribute characters in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack inflicts 60%/75%/90%/105%/120% more Anomaly Buildup.

chain_attack.name: Frozen Hurricane
chain_attack.description:
Attacks the target with a series of slashes, dealing Ice DMG and inflicting massive Ice Anomaly Buildup.

DMG Multiplier: 1435.5%/1531.2%/1626.8%/1722.6%/1818.3%

Daze Multiplier: 205.5%/219.2%/232.9%/246.6%/260.3%
